channel.title: Welcome to my Portfolio! on Adil Khwaja
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to my Portfolio! on Adil Khwaja

item.title: Project I: To build a system that enables Human Anatomy visualisation.
item.description: This is the prototype concept that my team presented in E-Medha'21 , which aims to find an alternative to Cadavers. Here we present one of the many ways to study Human Anatomy Virtually. The main highlight of this project is the inclusion of haptics. The concept mechanism is of 4 parts: Data Capturing using Radiology Data Processing using 3d Slicer Data Visualisation using 3d Builder or VR Glasses Haptic Feedback for virtual sense of touch.
